A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was beautiful in every aspect\, the plot\, the characters\, the cinematography. The dynamic between our protagonists is a highlight of the film\, and every single one of their interactions is electric. I would say that we spent a bit too much time with Oscar Isaac's character\, considering the ammount of actions he took in the movie (not many)\, which messed with the pacing a bit\, but otherwise there are no complaints. The movie definitely exceeded expectations\, and is a great addition to the Star Wars franchise.
